additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Built-in furniture, Technique, Intercom, Telephone, Internet, Satellite, Cable-TV, Alarm System, pass-through, Elevator, Heating system: central 
 For Sale: High-quality renovated four-room apartment (140 sq.m) on the 12th floor of new 14-storey building. It consists of three bedrooms, two balconies, closet, large living room with beautiful kitchen. Marble floors, built-in closets, Hansgrohes plumbing, Italian wallpaper, Bosch household appliances and air-conditioners, central heating and backup water heaters, acoustic system (installed in the walls), alarm systems, TV and wifi Silknet internet, Italian furniture, lighting systems and Austrian chandeliers.
